person.persName: William Bervl Smith (Henderson County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Henderson County, Kentucky, farmer. Virginia native. Son of Griffin Smith. Married Ann E. Smith. Father of Florence L. Smith, Alvin L. Smith, Ella Smith, Louisa A. Smith, Ann Ruth Smith, James G. Smith, and Elizabeth Smith. Farmer in Henderson County in 1860.

bibl.p: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Henderson County, Division 2, p. 34; Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Henderson County, Hibbardsville, p. 2; Kentucky Vital Statistics Original Death Certificates (1911-1955), Ancestry, 1913, Webster County, Kentucky, file no. 23050.
